text:
Sorry for the incredibly(!) late reply - I've been a bit absent from slack recently.

Thanks! It definitely goes some way to turning it from an undifferentiated mass to something with structure with reference points that you can orient yourself with. I've just added colour by type in what is hopefully an interesting and useful way... I'll share more on that later

I feel like the conceptual stuff I'm doing is pretty low-hanging fruit, there are just implementation difficulties to deal with :grinning:
Lucidity is great, I've had plans to include something similar, although with a slightly different emphasis (and probably not 3D initially!)

I should do a better job of distinguishing things currently in the tool and things designed/planned :grin:
Current outputs are:
• function inputs & outputs (text)
• debugger watch window details for the cursor position (text)
• all the changes that any variable/member goes through (text)
• graph of changes for primitive number vars
• timeline
There are many more planned, but I'm trying to be sensible with making sure the foundations are really solid before adding representations.
